title: Test Note #1
body:
This is a test note... ?

Things to Do:
  • Add more features to the text editor: bullet points, fonts, html editing, etc
  • Get the AutoSave feature working flawlessly
  • Implement user settings features
  • Test on Windows
  • Allow users to change window colors
  • Allow users to export document to pdf, text file, etc
  • Allow for auto saving to Google Drive, or something else
  • Figure out why I can't right click...
    • Need to create code for our right click actions
  • Add date tracking to notes and stuff
  • Jira Export would be really interesting...
  • Figure out why the app loses notes on ocassion and crashes..
OK, now we are cooking with fire!!

Let's try a quote:
I guess this works okay
Let's see if this note ends up saving correctly or gets lost...


Mkay, neat-o, this seems to be working fairly well...


La-di-da!!!


Current Bugs:
- App is not snappable for Windows or MacOS
